availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Franklin Benjamin McClary (Rockcastle County, Kentucky, attorney.)

body.p: Rockcastle County, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Son of Andrew McClary and Susan McClary. Attended school in Rockcastle County, Kentucky, in 1850. Attorney in Rockcastle County in 1860. Attorney in Rockcastle County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, Northern District, p. 206B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, Mount Vernon, p. 125.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, Mount Vernon, p. 33A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Rockcastle County, KY, June 1863, p. 244.
"Franklin Benjamin McClary (1837-1886)," Find A Grave, Memorial 5172309, accessed January 20, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/5172309.
